isRightSection.title: Is This Hairstyle Right for My Face Shape and Hair Type?
textContent: Choosing the right hairstyle starts with knowing your face shape and hair type. If you have an oval face, most styles will suit you, but for square faces, avoid sharp angles. Heart-shaped faces look great with softer styles, and round faces benefit from styles that add height.

When it comes to hair texture, curly hair benefits from voluminous styles like the Curly Bob, while fine or sparse hair needs more structure, such as a Bob Cut or Pixie. Our tool gives you real-time, realistic suggestions, so you can be confident in your choices.

Short, sleek styles (pixie cut, bob) look great on oval or heart faces. If your face is round, go with something with height like layered cuts. Square face? Add softness with curly styles or side-swept bangs. Hair texture also matters—if you have fine hair, structured cuts work better.
Try 60+ hairstyles virtually, risk-free. AI-powered filters give you a real preview, so you can see the style on your actual face—before making a decision. No data saved. Just try, smile, share.

additionalSection.title: Explore the Hottest Hairstyle Trends for Women in 2025
textContent: 2025 is all about versatility and expression! For short hair, the Bob Cut is still a top pick, offering textured and sleek options for every face shape. The Pixie Cut has also made a strong comeback, perfect for those looking for a bold, carefree look. Meanwhile, the Buzz Cut continues to make a statement, offering freedom and a strong, confident vibe.

For medium-length hair, the Textured Lob is incredibly popular, with its effortless waves that add movement and life to any look. If you prefer more volume, the Curly Shag is the go-to choice for a full, fun style that celebrates natural curls. Long hairstyles are just as exciting with layered waves and the elegant, flowing Mermaid Waves that give off a soft, free-spirited vibe.
Box Braids remain a favorite for their low-maintenance nature and cultural significance, while Dreadlocks continue to thrive, symbolizing both style and deep-rooted tradition.

regretsSection.title: Your Hair Journey: Grow It, Style It, Keep It Beautiful
textContent: Planning for a Big Event: Whether it's a wedding, a job interview, or a party, you want to look your best. Hairstyle AI lets you try different styles ahead of time so you can see exactly how you'll look before the big day. Experiment with updos, curls, or sleek looks, and choose the one that boosts your confidence.

Wondering How a Bold New Cut Will Look? Thinking of cutting your hair short but unsure how it will suit you? Hairstyle AI helps you explore bold options like a Pixie Cut or Bob without any commitment. Upload a photo, pick your style, and see how you look with that daring new cut.

Trying Different Hair Colors: Ever wondered how you'd look with a different hair color? Hairstyle AI allows you to experiment with over 19 colors without having to bleach or dye your hair. Whether you want to go blonde, brunette, or try something bold like red or purple, our tool shows you the result instantly.

Hair isn't just style—it's confidence. Whether you're leveling up for a date, a job, or just yourself, the right cut changes everything. Hairstyle AI lets you test looks, see yourself differently, and walk away more confident than ever.

howToUseSection.title: Transform Your Look in 4 Simple Steps
howToUseSection.description: See your next hairstyle before making the cut. With our free AI hairstyle changer, testing a bold new look is quick, fun, and private.

steps.title: Upload Your Photo
steps.description: Start by selecting a clear, high-quality photo of yourself. Choose an image where your face is fully visible and well-lit. We support PNG, JPG, and JPEG formats. Ensure the image is under 3MB to guarantee the best results. No worries about privacy—we never save your photo.

steps.title: Choose Your Hairstyle and Color
steps.description: Browse through our wide range of most popular women hairstyles and colors. Pick the one that suits you best – whether it's a bold Bob Cut or a trendy Pixie Cut. You can also experiment with different colors to find the perfect match for your vibe!

steps.title: Generate Your New Look
steps.description: Once you've chosen your style, click the 'Generate' button. Our AI will analyze your face and fit the selected hairstyle onto your photo in real time. Wait just a minute, and watch your transformation happen before your eyes.

steps.title: Download and Share Your Look
steps.description: When you're happy with your new look, simply download the image to your device. You can also share your fresh style on social media or with your friends to get their feedback! Want to try again? Go for it. You get 5 free tries per day.

features.description: You don't need to spend hours or money at a salon to try a new hairstyle. Hairstyle AI is completely free and easy to use. Simply upload your photo, choose your favorite style, and let the AI do the work, all at no cost! You get five hairstyle tries per day.

features.description: Hairstyle AI offers over 60+ hairstyles and 19 colors to try. From short, sleek styles to long, voluminous waves, there's something for every taste. Our tool gives you endless options to experiment and find the perfect look for you.

features.title: Realistic and Natural Results
features.description: Our AI-powered tool ensures that the hairstyle looks as realistic as possible. Unlike other filters, Hairstyle AI doesn't alter your face shape or skin tone. Your new style will blend naturally with your features, so you can be confident it's the right choice for you.

features.title: Data Privacy and Security Guaranteed
features.description: We value your privacy. Hairstyle AI doesn't store your photos, and all images are deleted immediately after the style transformation. You can use our tool worry-free, your privacy is our priority.

faqConfig.question: How realistic is the filter?
faqConfig.answer: The filter is highly realistic. It keeps your natural face shape, skin tone, and expressions. We don't stretch or alter your facial features. You get a true-to-life hairstyle preview that looks like a real photo.

faqConfig.question: Is it suitable for all genders and ages?
faqConfig.answer: Yes! Hairstyle AI is built for everyone—men, women, and all genders across any age. Teens, adults, and older users can all try different styles without risk.

faqConfig.question: What if I have thinning hair?
faqConfig.answer: If you have thinning hair, Hairstyle AI can still help you find a flattering style. Our AI takes into account hair texture and will suggest cuts that add volume or offer the illusion of thicker hair. For instance, a Curly Bob or layers could give you the fuller look you want.

faqConfig.question: How accurate is it for my skull shape/hairline?
faqConfig.answer: Hairstyle AI's tool accurately adjusts for different skull shapes and hairlines. The AI analyzes your face and head structure to ensure the hairstyle fits well. Whether you have a prominent hairline or a round skull, it'll show you how each style will complement your natural features.

faqConfig.question: What are the benefits of a new hairstyle?
faqConfig.answer: A new hairstyle can bring a fresh, confident look, boost self-esteem, and create a new identity. Changing your style can help you feel more aligned with your current life stage or personal transformation. Plus, a new haircut can make you feel rejuvenated and empowered!

faqConfig.question: How long does hair take to grow back?
faqConfig.answer: Hair typically grows about half an inch per month. Depending on the length you want, it could take anywhere from several months to a couple of years for your hair to grow back to its original length. Regular haircuts and a healthy diet can help speed up the process.

faqConfig.question: What is the popular shag hairstyle for women over 50?
faqConfig.answer: For women over 50, the popular shag hairstyle often includes longer layers with textured bangs, giving a youthful appearance while maintaining elegance. This style is versatile, easy to manage, and works well for those with fine or thinning hair, adding volume and dimension.

faqConfig.question: What is the popular hairstyle for women over 60?
faqConfig.answer: Hairstyles for women over 60 typically focus on creating a youthful and elegant look while being low-maintenance. Popular choices include short bobs, layered pixie cuts, and soft curls that add volume and movement. These styles help frame the face, enhance natural features, and are easy to maintain.

faqConfig.question: Is it safe to use this tool? Will my photos be stored?
faqConfig.answer: Yes, it's totally safe. No photos are stored. Your image is deleted right after processing. We don't collect or share your data. Privacy is built into everything we do.
